name: Eden Crest
description:
Collect, train and romance up to 30 unique Bot-Girls as you explore the world with them!


Share unique moments, give them gifts and interact with them at your base to unlock unique intimate scenes with all of them!
Create your own harem of Bot-Girls!


Eden Crest is a game focused on collecting and training your bots as you fight against a corrupted mechanical goddess who has infected many wild bots around the world!
Use your own bots to defend yourself as you explore the vibrant and colorful world of Eden One!


All bots have different personalities, likes and dislikes with unique comments in every city!
Be sure to always interact with your favorite bots wherever you are!


Gameplay:

-Explore the world of Eden One as you collect items to upgrade your bots!

-Collect up to 30 unique bots with completely different abilities to build your party!

-Each bot has an elemental type (Fire, Forest, Water or Electric) that is stronger or weaker against other types! Make sure you have a diverse party!

-Command them in battle against the wild bots that attack you across the world!

-Buy them gifts to unlock unique moments with them and eventually share an intimate moment that leads to a romantic sex scene!

-Lose to wild bots and enjoy the FEMDOM (Female Domination) aspect of the game!

-Train them to level up and become stronger as you unlock more skills!

-Each bot has 4 skills to use in battle! They gain them at levels 1, 5, 15 and 30!

-Equip your bots with powerful items to increase their status and take them into even more dangerous areas!

-Visit each town and challenge the leader to obtain a piece of the Eden Crest, necessary to defeat the evil goddess! ...and make babies with them when you win!
